name: snail_mail
description: Alexa skill to find the USPS collection boxes nearest you!

scripts.zpack: rm -rf node_modules/*; npm install --only=production; VER=`grep version package.json | perl -nle 'print $& if m{\d.\d.\d}'`;zip -r builds/snail-mail-$VER.zip index.js package.json node_modules; npm install; date
